statements: SELECT * FROM PestInfestationData ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT pest_type, location FROM PestInfestationData WHERE pest_count > 10
SELECT * FROM PestInfestationData WHERE weather_conditions = 'Sunny'
SELECT location, pest_count FROM PestInfestationData ORDER BY pest_count DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PestInfestationData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT id, pest_type, location FROM PestInfestationData WHERE pest_count > 10 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM PestInfestationData WHERE location LIKE 'Backyard%' AND weather_conditions = 'Sunny'
SELECT date, pest_type, pest_count FROM PestInfestationData WHERE location = 'Kitchen' AND pest_type = 'Ants'
SELECT id, pest_type, location, pest_count FROM PestInfestationData WHERE pest_count BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY location ASC, date DESC
SELECT id, pest_type, location, weather_conditions FROM PestInfestationData WHERE weather_conditions IN ('Rainy', 'Cloudy')
SELECT * FROM Pests;
SELECT name, occurrence_date FROM Pests ORDER BY occurrence_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM Pests WHERE location = 'Garden' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT p.name, pp.prediction_result FROM Pests p JOIN PestPredictions pp ON p.id = pp.pest_id;
SELECT id, prediction_date FROM PestPredictions WHERE prediction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Pests WHERE occurrence_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT name, occurrence_date FROM Pests ORDER BY occurrence_date DESC
SELECT Pests.name, PestPredictions.prediction_result FROM Pests JOIN PestPredictions ON Pests.id = PestPredictions.pest_id
SELECT * FROM Pests WHERE location LIKE '%Garden%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS pest_count, location FROM Pests GROUP BY location HAVING pest_count > 1
SELECT * FROM pests;
SELECT pest_name, average_occurrences FROM pests WHERE average_occurrences > 2.5;
SELECT pest_name, last_occurrence FROM pests ORDER BY last_occurrence DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT pest_name, location_name, occurrence_date FROM pests JOIN occurrences ON pests.pest_id = occurrences.pest_id WHERE occurrence_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT pest_name, average_occurrences FROM pests WHERE average_occurrences > 2.5 ORDER BY pest_name ASC
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -75
SELECT pest_name, occurrence_date FROM pests JOIN occurrences ON pests.pest_id = occurrences.pest_id WHERE occurrence_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY occurrence_date DESC
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'G%' OR location_name LIKE 'M%' AND longitude < -70

SELECT pests.pest_name, occurrences.occurrence_date, locations.location_name FROM pests JOIN occurrences ON pests.pest_id = occurrences.pest_id JOIN locations ON occurrences.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE pests.average_occurrences < 2.0 AND locations.latitude > 30 ORDER BY pests.pest_name ASC
SELECT * FROM PestOccurrences;
SELECT pest_occurrence_id, pest_type, location FROM PestOccurrences;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentConditions WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT common_name, description FROM PestSpecies WHERE species_id = 3;
SELECT model_name, model_type, accuracy FROM PredictiveModels ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM PestOccurrences ORDER BY date_occurred DESC, severity ASC;
SELECT location, pest_type, date_occurred FROM PestOccurrences WHERE location='Garden' ORDER BY date_occurred ASC;
SELECT species_name, common_name, description FROM PestSpecies WHERE species_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY species_name;
SELECT model_name, trained_on, accuracy FROM PredictiveModels WHERE model_type='Classification' ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT env_condition_id, temperature, humidity FROM EnvironmentConditions WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY env_condition_id;
SELECT * FROM pest_occurrences;
SELECT pest_type, location, severity_level FROM pest_occurrences WHERE severity_level > 3;
SELECT occurrence_id, location, occurrence_date FROM pest_occurrences ORDER BY occurrence_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM pest_history WHERE total_occurrences < 10;
SELECT model_name, accuracy_level FROM pest_predictive_models WHERE accuracy_level > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM pest_occurrences;
SELECT occurrence_id, pest_type, location FROM pest_occurrences WHERE severity_level > 5;
SELECT p.pest_type, w.temperature, w.humidity FROM pest_occurrences p INNER JOIN weather_data w ON p.location = w.location;
SELECT ph.pest_type, ph.first_occurrence_date, ph.total_occurrences FROM pest_history ph WHERE ph.total_occurrences > 10 ORDER BY ph.total_occurrences DESC;
SELECT pm.model_name, pm.accuracy_level FROM pest_predictive_models pm ORDER BY pm.accuracy_level DESC;
